text: Ni akuwechetaga awala wakanile kuti: “Mmwe (Muhammadi ﷺ) nganim’ba ntenga.” Jilani: “Allah akukwanila kuwa Mboni chilikati changune ni jenumanja (yakuti une ntenga), kwisa soni awala wauli kukwao umanyilisi wa m’chitabu (mpela Abdullah bin Salam ni Ayuda wane kwisa soni Akilisito waujitiche Usilamu).”
